import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { motion } from "framer-motion" import anime from 'animejs/lib/anime.es.js'; import {useMediaQuery} from '@react-hook/media-query' const Menu = ({pageLoad}) => { const location = useLocation() const [animParams, setAnimParams] = useState(-34) const [menuMobile, setMenuMobile] = useState(false) const matches = useMediaQuery('only screen and (min-width: 1200px)') const handleMenuMobile = () => { if(menuMobile){setMenuMobile(false)} else{setMenuMobile(true)} } const handleCloseMenuMobile = () => { setMenuMobile(false) } useEffect(() =>{ if(pageLoad){ setAnimParams(0) } }, [pageLoad]) useEffect(() => { if(menuMobile){ anime({ targets: '.menuMobile', right: '0', duration:700, easing: "easeOutExpo", }) } else { anime({ targets: '.menuMobile', right: '-120vw', duration:700, easing: "easeOutExpo", }) } }, [menuMobile]) useEffect(() => { if(matches){ console.log('match') setMenuMobile(false) } }, [matches]) return ( <>
    {/*
  • nos services
    • */}
  • { location.pathname === "/menu-services" || location.pathname === "/service-mise-en-scene-live" || location.pathname === "/service-packshot-horizontal" || location.pathname === "/service-mannequin-vertical" || location.pathname === "/service-accessoires-eclipse" ?
    : '' } services e-com
  • { location.pathname === "/service-production-libre-cyclorama" ?
    : '' } cyclo
  • { location.pathname === "/service-retouches" ?
    : '' } post-prod
  • { location.pathname === "/galerie" ?
    : '' } galerie
  • { location.pathname === "/contact" ?
    : '' } contact
